item.description:
Hey Boston Volunteers,

 

Perusing the web, I was seeking Christmas day volunteer opportunity for you.

Here's a great variety of events - from the afternoon until the evening. 

Convenience and lots of choices. There's something for you.

Learn more: http://secure.jcrcboston.org/site/Calendar?id=100861&view=Detail

Note that I will be out of town. I simply wanted to share these opportunities with you.

New Year - New You! 

Happy Holidays! :)
Josh and the Boston Volunteers

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Who else wants to Voluncheer on Christmas? Learn more...
